sense.def:
To threaten to do something
pomeni nekoga opozoriti, da bomo morda naredili nekaj, kar bo zanj slabo.

Kadar nekaj
threatens people or things
, bo ljudem ali stvarem verjetno škodovalo .

seg.quote: He said that the war threatened the peace of the whole world.
The whole country is threatened with starvation.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
threatens to do something unpleasant
, se zdi, da se bo zgodilo nekaj neprijetnega.

seg.quote: The riots threatened to get out of hand.
